dialogues.name: Racer
dialogues.dialougeTxt: I can't wait to get this race started! Uhhh... What race is this again?

dialogues.name: Manager
dialogues.dialougeTxt: Really!? You've been racing for this long and still don't know the different types of races?

dialogues.name: Racer
dialogues.dialougeTxt: A race is a race, nothing else matters.

dialogues.name: Manager
dialogues.dialougeTxt: Why do I even bother... This is the Checkpoint Race, it's basically a warm-up. You just have to go through all the checkpoints within a time limit.

dialogues.name: Manager
dialogues.dialougeTxt: Each checkpoint you reach will give you some exstra time to finish the race. You win by reaching the last checkpoint within the time limit.
